All familiar.  What version of JUnit?  I am using 3.7.

I assume you are also using the Javac for JDK 1.3?

(I ran into some problems moving back and forth between JDK 1.4 and JDK
1.3--classes that where compiled on JDK 1.4's compiler did not operate
as expected when run on a JDK 1.3 VM).
